uber

Class UberApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • uber.UberApp

  • public class UberApp
extends java.lang.Object
    UberApp connects the various methods and classes of the package into one cohesive program Represents the overall app connecting the Drivers and Passengers
    Author:
    Tim Lee

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UberApp() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Trip createRandomTrip(Passenger passenger, java.util.List<Driver> drivers)
      Creates a trip with a randomly selected destination within the grid
      static Trip createTrip(Passenger passenger, Location dest, java.util.List<Driver> drivers)
      Creates a Trip for a given Passenger based on the given List of Drivers Sorts Drivers by proximity and has them accept/decline in priority order Informs Passenger when a Driver accepts request or when all Drivers have declined
      static void executeTransaction(Trip trip)
      Alters the balance of a Trip's Driver and Passenger Cancels the Trip if the Passenger has insufficient balance Passenger pays fare, Driver receives 3/4 of fare Structurally may have fit better in Trip class, but informing Passengers makes it fit better organizationally in this class
      static void randomizeLocations(java.util.List<User> users)
      Assigns a random Location to all Users in the List Initialize() method in UberIO lacks information about grid size, so cannot randomly assign locations
      static java.util.List<Trip> runTrips(UsersList users)
      Creates and runs trips for all Passengers based on the given set of users Utilizes various helper methods in this class Multithreading allows Trips to run in parallel
      static Location selectRandomLocation()
      Helper method creates a random Location within grid boundaries

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • runTrips

        public static java.util.List<Trip> runTrips(UsersList users)
        Creates and runs trips for all Passengers based on the given set of users Utilizes various helper methods in this class Multithreading allows Trips to run in parallel
        Parameters:
        users - the set of all Passengers and Drivers to monitor
        Returns:
        the List of all Trips, completed or cancelled

      • createTrip

        public static Trip createTrip(Passenger passenger,
                              Location dest,
                              java.util.List<Driver> drivers)
        Creates a Trip for a given Passenger based on the given List of Drivers Sorts Drivers by proximity and has them accept/decline in priority order Informs Passenger when a Driver accepts request or when all Drivers have declined
        Parameters:
        passenger - the Passenger who will be riding
        dest - the chosen Location to take the Passenger
        drivers - the list of all possible Drivers
        Returns:
        a Trip object containing the passenger, selected location, and chosen driver

      • createRandomTrip

        public static Trip createRandomTrip(Passenger passenger,
                                    java.util.List<Driver> drivers)
        Creates a trip with a randomly selected destination within the grid
        Parameters:
        passenger - the passenger who will be riding
        drivers - the list of all possible driver
        Returns:
        a Trip object containing the passenger, selected location, and chosen driver

      • executeTransaction

        public static void executeTransaction(Trip trip)
        Alters the balance of a Trip's Driver and Passenger Cancels the Trip if the Passenger has insufficient balance Passenger pays fare, Driver receives 3/4 of fare Structurally may have fit better in Trip class, but informing Passengers makes it fit better organizationally in this class
        Parameters:
        trip - the trip to oversee the transaction for

      • randomizeLocations

        public static void randomizeLocations(java.util.List<User> users)
        Assigns a random Location to all Users in the List Initialize() method in UberIO lacks information about grid size, so cannot randomly assign locations
        Parameters:
        users - the List of Users to assign to random Locations in the grid

      • selectRandomLocation

        public static Location selectRandomLocation()
        Helper method creates a random Location within grid boundaries
        Returns:
        a random Location
